title: SmartAddons SJ Live Joomla 3.x Template
description:
SJ Live - a nice design for Joomla 3.x, has been developed with fully responsive layout with many components integrated in. Thanks to SJ Live, you can easily establish an attractive website with various color presets and module styles.

Specially, SJ Live is our first template integrated with AdsManager - the leading classified ads component for Joomla! It provides a base for creating the most desirable classified site with highly customizable and flexible.

Built on the latest YT Framework version - the powerful Joomla template framework, K2 component - the best content extension and many extensions supported, SJ Live is best adaptable for classified website or complicated directory website... You can also customize site as the way you wish, of course.
